pkgmetadata.longdescription: 1d Goodness of Fit Tests // Routines that allow the user to run a large number of goodness-of-fit tests. It allows for data to be continuous or discrete. It includes routines to estimate the power of the tests and display them as a power graph. The routine run.studies allows a user to quickly study the power of a new method and how it compares to some of the standard ones.
